game.name: SECTOR ZERO
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Adjustable Text Size, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: SECTOR ZERO는 물리 기반의 어두운 SF 퍼즐 어드벤처로, 소행성 2031 XT 깊은 곳에서 채굴 작업으로 인해 깨어난 고대 집단 의식체의 조각으로 플레이합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: SECTOR ZERO is a physics-based, dark sci-fi puzzle adventure where you play as a fragment of an ancient hive-mind entity, awakened by mining operations deep within Asteroid 2031 XT.
